workflow.name: Build an MCP Server with Google Calendar and Custom Functions
workflow.description:
Learn how to build an MCP Server and Client in n8n with official nodes.

> ⚠ Requires n8n version 1.88.0 or higher.

In this example, we use Google Calendar and custom functions as two separate MCP Servers, demonstrating how to integrate both native and custom tools.

### How it works

The AI Agent connects to two MCP Servers. Each MCP Trigger (Server) generates a URL exposing its tools. This URL is used by an MCP Client linked to the AI Agent.

Whenever you make changes to the tools, there’s no need to modify the MCP Client. It automatically keeps the AI Agent informed on how to use each tool, even if you change them over time.

That’s the power of MCP 🙌

### Who is this template for

Anyone looking to use MCP with their AI Agents.

### How to set up

Instructions are included within the workflow itself.

### Check out my other templates

👉 [**https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/**](https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/)

workflow.name: Build your first AI MCP Server

options.systemMessage:
=You are a helpful assistant.
Current datetime is {{ $now.toString() }}

parameters.name: convert_text_case
parameters.description: Call this tool to convert text to lower case or upper case.

parameters.content:
## Activate the workflow to make the MCP Trigger work
In order to make the MCP server available, you need to activate the workflow.

Then copy the Production URL of the MCP Trigger and paste it in the corresponding MCP Client tool.

## MCP Clients
For every tool here you need to obtain he corresponding Production URL from the MCP Triggers on the right 👉

# Try these example requests with the AI Agent

### My Functions MCP
1. Use your tools to convert this text to lower case: `EXAMPLE TeXt`

2. Use your tools to convert this text to upper case: `example TeXt`

3. Generate 5 random user data, please.

4. Please obtain 3 jokes.




### Calendar MCP
5. What is my schedule for next week?

6. I have a meeting with John tomorrow at 2pm. Please add it to my Calendar.

7. Adjust the time of my meeting with John tomorrow from 2pm to 4pm, please.

8. Cancel my meeting with John, tomorrow.

parameters.name: obtain_jokes
parameters.description: Call this tool to obtain random jokes

parameters.content:
## The My Functions MCP calls this sub-workflow every time.
A subworkflow is a separate workflow that can be called by other workflows and is able to receive parameters.
Learn more about sub-workflows **[here](https://docs.n8n.io/flow-logic/subworkflows/)**

## Google Calendar tools require credentials
If you don't have your Google Credentials set up in n8n yet, watch [this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3Ai1EPznlAc) video to learn how to do it.

If you are using n8n Cloud plans, it's very intuitive to setup and you may not even need the tutorial.

# Author
![Solomon](https://gravatar.com/avatar/79aa147f090807fe0f618fb47a1de932669e385bb0c84bf3a7f891ae7d174256?r=pg&d=retro&size=200)
### Solomon
Freelance consultant from Brazil, specializing in automations and data analysis. I work with select clients, addressing their toughest projects.

Currently running the [Scrapes community](https://www.skool.com/scrapes/about?ref=21f10ad99f4d46ba9b8aaea8c9f58c34) with Simon 💪

For business inquiries, email me at automations.solomon@gmail.com
Or message me on [Telegram](https://t.me/salomaoguilherme) for a faster response.

## Check out my other templates
### 👉 https://n8n.io/creators/solomon/

# Need help?
For getting help with this workflow, please create a topic on the community forums here:
https://community.n8n.io/c/questions/

## Why model 4o? 👆
After testing 4o-mini it had some difficulties handling the calendar requests, while the 4o model handled it with ease.

Depending on your prompt and tools, 4o-mini might be able to work well too, but it requires further testing.
# Learn How to Build an MCP Server and Client
